content: I think I'll make sure to include detailed descriptions of my action figures when listing them on eBay. It's a good idea to be transparent about their condition and any flaws or defects. I've been thinking about my collectibles a lot lately, especially since I started collecting vintage cameras around the same time I moved into my new apartment three months ago. Anyway, back to selling my duplicates - do you think I should set a fixed price or auction my action figures on eBay?
